## 1.Loading and preprocessing the data

## 2. What is mean total number of steps taken per day?

### 2.1 Calculate the total number of steps taken per day
```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
StepsByDay <- tapply(Data$steps, Data$date, sum, na.rm=TRUE)
head(StepsByDay)
```
